DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether estrogen may help reduce fear high calorie-density food weight-restored woman Anorexia Nervosa ( AN ) .
DOC.brief_title: Estradiol Fear Extinction Anorexia Nervosa ( AN )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( AN ) : Previous diagnosis recent AN BMI < 18.5 ( within past year ) Current BMI > 19.0 < 23.0 kg/m2 Amenorrhea oligomenorrhea Inclusion Criteria ( Healthy Controls ) : BMI > 19 < 23 kg/m2 Taking hormonebased contraceptive period one month Eating disorder symptom score within one standard deviation healthy control Exclusion Criteria ( AN ) : Any medical psychiatric problem require urgent medical psychiatric attention , include acute suicidality History breast cancer , deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism , myocardial infarction stroke , diabetes , liver disease , know thrombophilic disease Currently take estrogen progesterone medication Tobacco use great 1 pack per week Use St. John 's Wort , Phenobarbital , phenytoin , carbamazepine , rifampin , dexamethasone decrease plasma estrogen level CYP3A4 inducer . Cimetidine , erythromycin , clarithromycin , ketoconazole , itraconazole , ritonavir grapefruit juice may increase plasma estrogen , potentially increase presence side effect Pregnant , lactate unwilling use appropriate birth control ( may include abstinence ) prevent pregnancy duration study participation ( i.e . 4 week ) Allergy estradiol medroxyprogesterone ingredient food item use test meal Undiagnosed , abnormal vaginal bleeding Exclusion Criteria ( Healthy Controls ) : Ever diagnose Eating Disorder Any medical psychiatric problem require urgent medical psychiatric attention , include acute suicidality Pregnant , lactate unwilling use appropriate birth control ( may include abstinence ) prevent pregnancy duration study participation ( i.e . 4 week ) Food allergy item test meal
